### translate ê°’ ì¡°íšŒí•˜ê¸°
```javascript
function getTranslateXY(element) {
    const style = window.getComputedStyle(element)
    const matrix = new DOMMatrixReadOnly(style.transform)
    return {
        translateX: matrix.m41,
        translateY: matrix.m42
    }
}
```
